display_long_description:
Step into the world of Duck Hunt like never before with Duck Hunt VR! This immersive virtual reality experience brings the classic hunting game to life, allowing you to engage in the ultimate duck-hunting adventure from the comfort of your own home.
Features:

🎯 Realistic Hunting Experience: Grab your VR controller and aim for the sky as you track and shoot virtual ducks in stunning 3D environments. Feel the thrill of the hunt with accurate motion controls and lifelike sound effects.

🏞️ Diverse Environments: Explore a variety of beautifully rendered landscapes, from serene wetlands to dense forests. Each environment offers unique challenges and different duck species to hunt.

👻 Dynamic AI: Face off against intelligent and unpredictable ducks. Watch them dart, dive, and weave through the sky as you adapt your strategy to keep up with their evasive maneuvers.
